ad.title: Luxury 5 Bedrooms House for sale in Boralesgamuwa
ad.description:
Luxury 5 Bedrooms House for sale in Boralesgamuwa Bokundara

* 𝟏𝟎.𝟖 𝐏𝐞𝐫𝐜𝐡𝐞𝐬 | 𝟓 𝐁𝐞𝐝𝐫𝐨𝐨𝐦𝐬 | 𝟑 𝐁𝐚𝐭𝐡𝐫𝐨𝐨𝐦𝐬 | 𝟑𝟕 𝐌𝐈𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐨𝐧 | 𝟑𝟕𝟎 𝐥𝐤𝐬 *

House built with high quality materials 9 Inch gadol).  Clear deed & approved plan with COC. 

International schools, Government schools , Super Markets, Highway entrance, Hospitals & Bank are just 5 minutes reach. Please visit the property for the inspection. Call for more info

800 meters to ( 120 Colombo main road)
3 Kms to Boralesgamuwa Junction 

𝐇𝐨𝐮𝐬𝐞 𝐈𝐧𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧
✅ 10.8 Perches
✅ 2800 sqft
✅ 5 Bedrooms
✅ 3 Bathrooms ( Attached bathrooms + Hot water)
✅ Kitchen with modern full pantry
✅ Large Living and Dining area
✅ TV lobby
✅ CCTV
✅ Car porch (2 Cars can park )
✅ Large front balconies 
✅ Garden space 
✅ Roller Gate
✅ Garden wall
✅ Clear Deed
✅ Approved Plans

මීට අමතරව තවත් නිවාස සහ ඉඩම් ඔබට සරිලන මුදලට මිලදී ගැනීමට අප සතුව ඇත. අප හා සම්බන්ධ වී විස්තර දැනගන්න.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
අපගේ සේවාවන් :
1. ඔබගේ හදිසි මුදල් අවශ්‍යතාවය මත වාහන, නිවාස සහ දේපල ,ලැප්ටොප් , ස්මාට් ෆෝන්  ඇප මත කඩිනම් ණය පහසුකම් අපගේ ආයතනය මගින් ලබා ගත හැක.
2. ඔබ ඉඩමක් හෝ නිවසක් මිලදී ගැනීමේදී අවශ්‍ය වන බැංකු ණය පහසුකම් අප ආයතනය විසින් සලසා දෙනු ලැබේ. 
3. ඔබගේ ඉඩමක නිවාස ඉදිකිරීම් කටයුතුද අප ආයතනය මගින් විශ්වාසවන්තව සිදුකරගත හැක.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
සියලුම විස්තර කියවා බලා නිවස / ඉඩම බැලීමට කලින් වෙලාවක් වෙන් කරගන්න

👉  𝐂𝐚𝐥𝐥 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐦𝐨𝐫𝐞 𝐢𝐧𝐟𝐨 -  
𝗔𝘀𝗶𝗿𝗶 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗿𝘁𝗶𝗲𝘀 & 𝗟𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗦𝗮𝗹𝗲𝘀 (𝗣𝗿𝗶𝘃𝗮𝘁𝗲) 𝗟𝗶𝗺𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗱

text.1: The Urgent Bundle is an excellent way to sell your item quickly at a low price! This promotion is available only on select ads. The following features are included:
text.2: The Urgent promotion ensures that your ad stands out from the rest (shown with a red tag). Your ad will also be shown in the Urgent filter thereby giving it more visibility.
text.3: Your ad will be shown higher (than ads that are not promoted with Urgent Bundle) in the Simlar Ads section of similar items. Your ad will be shown in a prominent position to potential buyers looking to buy an item similar to the one you are selling.
text.4: You will get access to analytics related to your ad for as long as it is live on ikman. You will be able to see the number of times your ad was viewed (Ad Views) as well as the number of buyers interested in your ad (Leads). These stats will be shown on the ad once it is published (you need to be logged in to your account to view the stats).

breadcrumbTitle.home: ikman - The largest marketplace in Sri Lanka!
breadcrumbTitle.jobsHome: ikman - Sri Lanka's Largest Recruitment Platform

ad-promotions.title: Ad Promotions
ad-promotions.desc1: Sell your items quickly at the best price by making your ads stand out on ikman - the largest marketplace in {country}!
ad-promotions.desc2: While it's free to post ads on ikman, Ad Promotions is a paid tool that gets you more responses on your ads and helps you sell faster.

left.title: Get more views and responses
left.desc: Ad Promotions are designed to get more views and responses to your ad while saving you time and effort!

right.title: Sell fast for the best price
right.desc: More responses means more interested buyers for your ad. You have the power to sell the item at the best possible price!

promotion-types.title: Pick from multiple Ad Promotions!
promotion-types.desc: You can apply the above Ad Promotions in any combination you choose! Applying multiple Ad Promotions at once gets you even more views and responses so you can sell even faster.

topad.title: Top Ad
topad.desc: At the top of every ad listing page, there are up to 2 spots reserved for Top Ads. By adding a Top Ad promotion to your ad, you earn the chance for your ad to be displayed in one of these Top Ad spots - which can get you up to 5 times or more views!

points.1: Top Ads stand out - they are bigger than regular ads, highlighted in yellow, and clearly marked "Top Ad".
points.2: Each Top Ad is given an equal chance of being displayed in the Top Ad slots. This means thousands of extra appearances for each Top Ad daily for the duration of the promotion.
points.3: In addition to being displayed in the Top Ad slots, your ad is also posted as a regular ad.

bumpup.title: Bump Up
bumpup.desc: Apply the Bump Up promotion to bump your ad to the top and get up to 10 times more views as compared to regular ads!

points.1: Bumped Up ads are displayed at the top of the regular ad listings once a day, and move down the page as new ads are posted.
points.2: This process repeats daily for the duration of the promotion.

urgent.title: Urgent
urgent.desc: Want to sell urgently? Apply the Urgent promotion to communicate your urgency to buyers who are looking for a great deal!

points.1: Urgent ads are highlighted with a bright red marker on the ad.
points.2: Combine this promotion with a Top Ad or Bump Up to ensure your ad stays on top of regular listings and gets up to 10 times more views.
points.3: Urgent ads have their own filter! Buyers can easily find your ad by applying the Urgent filter.

spotlight.title: Spotlight
spotlight.desc: Apply the Spotlight promotion to showcase your high-value items in a large super premium slot right at the top of the ad listings page. Ads promoted with Spotlight attract immediate attention from buyers, so make sure you add great looking photos to your ad!

points.1: Spotlight ads are visually appealing, with big images and a clean design which attracts buyer attention immediately.
points.2: Each Spotlight ad is given an equal chance of being shown in this super premium spot, with 5 ads being shown automatically to every user.
points.3: In addition to Spotlight, your ad is also posted as a regular ad.

schedulepromotionn.title: Schedule Promotion
schedulepromotionn.desc: Our scheduling feature ensures stress-free planning, eliminating last-minute rushes.

points.1: No manual activation is needed, set the date and time, and our system does the rest.
points.2: Align promotions with events, launches, holidays, and peak buying times.
points.3: Unlock the full potential of promotions at no extra cost.

advertise.description: Along with the service of posting an ad on ikman, we now offer extra options for businesses who want to reach new customers quickly and easily. With our banner advertising opportunities, you can target local customers directly and advertise your brand efficiently.

membership-page.title: Increase your sales with a ikman Membership!
membership-page.sub-title-1: Memberships create a bigger presence for your business on ikman, so you can reach even more customers. Our Membership packages are specifically designed to give you the tools you need to expand your business and increase your sales.
membership-page.sub-title-2: As a member, you will also be receiving our newsletter with powerful tips on how to effectively increase your business on ikman.

more-ads.title: Post more ads
more-ads.desc1: Post more ads with a membership! Focus on creating good ads that effectively sell your items rather than worrying about ad limits. The more ads you post, the more you sell!
more-ads.desc2: Select trusted members with a proven track record may also avail auto-approvals of their ads.

member-badge.title: Member badge
member-badge.desc1: The member badge is shown on all member ads, thereby setting your ads apart from ads posted by individual sellers! We also offer special badges to make your ads more exclusive.

free-promo.title: Free promotions
free-promo.desc1: Promote your ads for free! Get free vouchers every month that you can use to apply Top ad, Bump up, Urgent, or Spotlight promotions to your ads and get even more responses.

your-shop.title: Your own shop on ikman
your-shop.desc1: Create your own brand on ikman by having a page dedicated entirely to your business! This is like your own online store - all your ads are listed in one place and you can customize it by adding your tagline, logo, cover picture, and other business details.

more-images.title: Add more images
more-images.desc1: Our membership packages allow you to add more images to make your ads more attractive and descriptive! The more authentic images you add, the more effective your ad becomes in generating customer interest.

track-buyer.title: Track buyer interest
track-buyer.desc1: See how much interest your ad has generated among buyers on a daily basis! You can track both the number of views and the leads over the ad’s lifetime to understand its performance.

new-dev.title: New developments
new-dev.desc1: Are you a property developer building a new project? Get your own dedicated page to highlight and sell units in your new project! You can specify all the project details and list the units available on this page. Ads for these units will be listed in a separate category called New Projects.

jobs.title: Jobs
jobs.desc1: Track and manage all job applications received on your ads easily via Employer Dashboard.
jobs.desc2: Quickly find the talent you need by searching and filtering through the profiles in our online Profile Database.
jobs.desc3: Staffing Solutions makes hiring even more hassle-free! Share your criteria with us and get a list of high-quality pre-screened candidates to choose from.

doorstep.title: Doorstep Delivery
doorstep.desc1: is ikman’s eCommerce solution. When you post a Doorstep Delivery ad, you enjoy the flexibility of handling the buyer interaction and item delivery yourself or leaving it to us.
doorstep.desc3: and discounts which will be highlighted on your ads.
doorstep.desc4: Get listed as a Power seller to get benefits such as free online marketing and premium customer service.

build-trust.title: Build trust
build-trust.desc1: With a membership at ikman we’re helping building trust to your online shop. Members get a "Member since" note on their ads and shops to show case for how long they have been a trusted member.
build-trust.desc2: Select members may also avail the
build-trust.link-title: Learn more about special member badges

ad-repost.title: Automatically re-post your ads
ad-repost.desc1: Tired of re-posting the same ad over and over when it expires? Look no further! As a member of ikman you’ll have the ability when posting an ad to make it auto-renew on expiration.

super-charged-discovery.title: Super charged ad discovery
super-charged-discovery.desc1: To help market your ads, ikman will display other items from your shop - instead of similar ads from your competitors - when your customers are browsing your ads.
super-charged-discovery.desc2: As a premium member, we make it easier for your customers to find your ads, they will also be able to search among your ads on your shop page.

support.title: Dedicated customer support
support.desc1: Get a dedicated executive to help you with all your needs, including posting ads! You additionally get access to our sales and customer support teams throughout your membership period.

membership-types.title: Special member badges
membership-types.premium: Buy a Business Premium Membership to not only get a special badge but also a higher ad limit and other benefits.
membership-types.verified: Verify your details with ikman to get this coveted badge that indicates to buyers that you are trustworthy and it is safe to transact with you.
membership-types.auth-dealer: Authorized Dealers get this exclusive badge that guarantees buyers that they will get authentic items when they buy from you.
membership-types.featured: Having the Featured badge on all your ads, helps your ads stand out from others and increase sales. This badge is provided only for selected members.

contract.title: Easy monthly pricing and no long-term contracts
contract.sub-title1: Choose between our Business Plus and Business Premium Membership packages.

about-us.description-1: {market} is a platform on which you can buy and sell almost  everything! Use the location selector to find the deals close to you.
about-us.description-2: ads to have items delivered directly to you with 100% buyer protection.
about-us.sell-des: Sign up for a free account to start selling your items! It takes less than 2 minutes to post an ad. Visit How to sell fast for some tips on creating great ads that generate a lot of buyer interest. If you have a lot of items to sell, consider buying a membership and enjoy additional benefits. We also have some great tools that help make your ad stand out from the rest. Check out the Ad Promotions page for more information.
about-us.buy-des: {market} has the widest selection of items all over {country} and across more than 50 different categories. Whether you're looking for a car, mobile phone, house, computer or pet, you will find the best deal on {market}. Our search and filters make it super easy to find exactly what you're looking for!

faq-page.title: FAQ
faq-page.sub-title: Get answers to the most frequently asked questions.

general.a1: Posting an ad on {brand} is quick and easy! Simply click the yellow Post Ad button and follow the instructions. If you are not already logged in, you will need to log in as the first step of posting your ad. Your ad will go live once it has been reviewed (this usually takes less than 4 hours during office hours).
general.a2: To delete an ad, please go to your ad's page and click on the "Delete ad" option.
general.a2tip: Tip: you can find your ad easily by logging in to your account and visiting your "My ads" page!
general.a3: To edit an ad, please go to your ad's page and click on the "Edit ad" option.
general.a3tip: Tip: you can find your ad easily by logging in to your account and visiting your "My ads" page!
general.a4:
To set a new {brand} password, please log in to your account, go to the "Settings" page and enter a new password.

If you have forgotten your {brand} password, you can:

- go to the log-in page and click on the "Forgot your password?" link
- go to one of your ads, click on "Edit ad" or "Delete ad", and click on the "Forgot your password?" link.

If you have created an account via Facebook, you will not have a {brand} password. You can log in to your account via Facebook without a password.
general.a5: Ads appear for 60 days, unless you delete them earlier.
general.a6: Your ad may not be live due to one of the following reasons: - It is still under review - this will show on your My Ads page, under “Ads under review” - It may have it violated our posting rules - if your ad needs to be edited before it can be published, this will show on your My Ads page, under “Ads that need editing” - You have used up your free ad allowance If you have been waiting longer than 24 hours for a response from us, you may have given us the wrong contact details when you posted the ad. Try posting again or contact us.
general.a6tip: Tip: you can keep track of your ads easily by logging in to your account and visiting your "My ads" page!
general.a7: All of the ads are manually reviewed - if your ad violates our posting rules it will be rejected. You can read what changes you have to make before the ad can be approved in the rejection email.
general.a8: Of course. Please contact us and we will help you right away.
general.a9: If you are not receiving responses to our ads, we recommend taking a look at our tips on how to sell fast.
general.a10: {brand} offers paid features and services that help people promote their ads, facilitate the sales of advertised items, and give businesses a bigger online presence. These currently include ad promotions and {brand} Membership.
general.a11:
We don't allow ads that contain: 
- an item or service that is illegal in {country}
- an item or service that is not located in {country} 
- an invalid phone number or email address
- an unrealistic offer
- offensive language
- offensive pictures
- text in the title or description that is not related to the advertised item or service
- pictures that do not match or clearly show the advertised item or service
- text in the first picture (except logos and product codes)
- a non-specific item or service, e.g. a description of a company in general terms 
- a URL link that is not relevant to the advertised item or service 
- offers and requests for items or services in the same ad 
- exact same content as another ad, re-published within 7 days.
- multiple items in the same ad
- “work from home" jobs
- counterfeit goods, knockoffs or replica versions of another company’s product
- In addition, once the ad is posted, the product or service in the ad cannot be changed.
general.a12: Signing up for an account on {market} is quick, easy and completely free! To sign up on {market}, please go to the Sign up page and follow the instructions. You can sign up with an email address or phone number. It's also possible to log in using for example your Google or Facebook account.
general.a13:
To log in to your account, simply go to the Log in page and enter your phone number. We will send you an One Time Passcode (OTP) via SMS that you can use to login. If you have created an account via Facebook or Google, click on the respective buttons and follow the instructions.

To log out of your account, simply click the "Log out" option.
general.a14: To change the details on your account, log in to your account and go to your account's "Settings" page.
general.a15: If you are having trouble logging in to your account, please check that you have: - Signed up for an account. - Entered the correct phone number / email address and password on the log in page. If you are still having trouble accessing your account, please contact us.
general.a16: Every month you can post a few ads for free in most categories on {brand}, except categories that require payment of a listing fee. Once you have used up your posting allowance for the month, you can either set up a Membership in order to post more ads, or wait until the first day of the next month when your allowance gets reset.
general.a17: Doorstep Delivery is the easiest and safest way to buy items on ikman. Simply look for an ad with the Doorstep Delivery option, click on “Order Online” and fill out the form. The seller will call you to confirm the order and arrange a delivery time. To learn all about the benefits of Doorstep Delivery, please visit our Doorstep Delivery on ikman page.
general.a18: To start a chat, go to an ad and click the `Chat` option. This will open a private chat between you and the ad poster.
general.a19: To read your chat messages, click the chat icon at the top right of the screen and go to `Chats` page.

market.a1: ikman uses Unicode to display Sinhala and Tamil text. If you are using Windows XP or an earlier version, you may need to set up Unicode support in order to view our Sinhala or Tamil site. Step 1: Get Sinhala / Tamil Unicode support - Follow the instructions to install Sinhala Unicode support here. - Follow the instructions to install Tamil Unicode support here. Step 2: Add Sinhala / Tamil fonts - Download Sinhala fonts from here, then copy the font files to your system's "Font" directory. - Tamil font is pre-installed in Windows XP and later versions. Step 3: Refresh ikman.
market.a2: There are a few methods you can use to type in Sinhala and Tamil: - Follow the instructions in the appropriate user guide provided here for Sinhala and here for Tamil - Download Google Input Tools - Use an online keyboard, such as Google Transliteration for Sinhala or Google Transliteration for Tamil, and then copy-paste the text over to ikman. - For some mobile phone users, it may be possible to obtain a Sinhala or Tamil keyboard through a smartphone app.
market.q1: How do I read Sinhala and Tamil text?
market.q2: How do I write in Sinhala or Tamil?
market.title: Additional Q&A

products.a1: To learn all about Top Ads, please visit our Promote your ad page. You can also click "Learn more" under the Top Ad option after you click the "Promote ad" option on your ad.
products.a2:
If you don't see your Top Ad right away, it means that there are more Top Ads available than there are number of Top Ad spots. In this case, each Top Ad is given an equal chance of being displayed. 

To see your Top Ad in action, you can try the following:
- Go to the category and location that you posted the ad in and select any relevant filters.
- Click through to the next few pages, or refresh your page to browse different Top Ads.

sellfast-page.title: Sell fast on ikman
sellfast-page.sub-title-1: Below are some tips on how to post ads that attract a lot of buyer interest.

more-detail.title: Add as much detail as you can
more-detail.desc1: Ads with clear details get more views! Include keywords and information that buyers will be interested in. Remember to be honest while providing these details.

great-photos.title: Add great photos
great-photos.desc1: Use clear photos of the item you're selling. Ads with real photos get up to 10 times more views than ads with catalogue/stock photos. Make sure the lighting is good and take photos from different angles.

right-price.title: Pick the right price
right-price.desc1: Everything sells if the price is right! Browse similar ads on ikman and choose a competitive price. In general, the lower the price, the higher is the demand. If you are willing to negotiate, be sure to select the Negotiable option while posting the ad.

ad-promotions.title: Apply Ad Promotions!
ad-promotions.desc1: Now that you have created a great ad, it's time to show it off! Apply
ad-promotions.desc3: to get up to 10 times more views and interested buyers for your ad. The higher the demand, the better your chances of selling fast for the price that you want.

staysafe-page.title: Stay safe on ikman
staysafe-page.sub-title-1: At ikman, we are 100% committed to making sure that your experience on our platform is as safe as possible.
staysafe-page.sub-title-2: Here's some advice on how to stay safe while trading on ikman.

1.title: Keep things local
1.content-1: Meet the seller in person and check the item before you make a payment.
1.content-2: and have items delivered to you with 100% buyer protection.

2.title: While applying for a job
2.content: Research the job and the employer before you apply. Don’t give out personal information before meeting the employer in person. Avoid going to remote locations for an interview.

3.title: Exchange item and payment at the same time
3.content: Buyers: don't make any payments before receiving an item. Sellers: don't send an item before receiving payment.

4.title: Use common sense
4.content: Avoid anything that appears too good to be true, such as unrealistically low prices and promises of quick money.

5.title: Never give out financial information
5.content: This includes bank account details, eBay/PayPal info, and any other information that could be misused.

scams-frauds.title: Scams and frauds to watch out for

1.title: Fake payment services
1.content: ikman does not offer any form of payment scheme or protection. Please report any emails claiming to offer such services. Avoid using online payment services or escrow sites unless you are 100% sure that they are genuine.

2.title: Fake information requests
2.content: ikman never sends emails requesting your personal details. If you receive an email asking you to provide your personal details to us, do not open any links. Please report the email and delete it.

3.title: Fake fee requests
3.content: Avoid anyone that asks for extra fees to buy or sell an item or service. ikman never requests payments for its basic services, and doesn't allow items that are not located in Sri Lanka, so import and brokerage fees should never be required.

4.title: Requests to use money transfer services such as Western Union or MoneyGram
4.content: These services are not meant for transactions between strangers and many scams are run through them. Avoid requests to use these services.

1.title: Email address is not shown on your ad
1.content: This ensures that you are protected from spam.

2.title: Option to hide phone number on your ad
2.content: You can choose to hide your phone number and still be contacted by interested buyers via chat.

3.title: Continuous improvements
3.content: We make constant imrpovements to our technology to detect and prevent suspicious or inappropriate activity.

4.title: Block repeat offendors
4.content: We track reports of suspicious or illegal activity to prevent offendors from using the site again.

1.title: Victim of a scam?
1.content: If you feel that you have been the victim of a scam, please report your situation to us immediately. If you have been cheated, we also recommend that you contact your local police department.

2.title: Information sharing
2.content: ikman is committed to the privacy of our users and does not share user information publicly. However, we take safety seriously and will cooperate with law enforcement if receive requests regarding fraudulent or other criminal activity.

sub-1.1: Returns, Replacements & Refund may be requested only under the following circumstances:
sub-1.title: Doorstep delivery return & Replacement policy

list-1.1: If the product is not in a working condition or if the specification (color, size, weight & dimensions) of the product does not match the description given in the ad or if the product is found to be physically damaged at the time of delivery.
list-1.2: The replacement claim must be made within 72 hours of delivery by emailing to support@ikman.com or complaining at 0112350350.
list-1.3: ikman will investigate the validity of the claim and exchange the product with a functional product in case of valid claims only.
list-1.4: For products without warranty, claims will not be considered after the specified period of 72 hours after delivery.
list-1.5: For products with warranty, claims will fall under the specific warranty policy and ikman will ensure the warranty is provided by the seller.

sub-2.1: Upon filing the complaints, ikman will call the buyer to verify the issues, within 48 hours.
sub-2.2: If the complaint made is found to be within the purview of the replacement policy, ikman will provide the following options to the Buyer:
sub-2.3: The Seller will receive the product from the courier, investigate the problems and if the complaint is deemed to be valid, only then will the product be replaced, along with a refund of the courier fee which the buyer had incurred. If the same product is not available, full refund will be processed, along with the courier fee incurred by Buyer. However, if the complaint is not valid, the same product will be returned to the buyer and there will be no refund of the courier fee incurred by the buyer.
sub-2.title: Doorstep delivery replacement process

list-1.1: Buyer will be informed of the nearest courier location where s/he must arrange the product for delivering it to the seller's location.
list-1.2: Or, ikman will arrange the pickup from the customer to the seller's location.
list-1.3: Product must be returned in the same condition as it was received, along with the undamaged box, which came with the product. Replacement cannot be made if any parts of the product are missing or the box has been damaged.

sub-3.1: If your product is eligible for a refund, you can choose your preferred refund method based on the table below. The delivery charges are refunded along with the amount paid for your returned product.
sub-3.2: The time required to complete a refund depends on the refund type you have selected. Once the seller has received your product (2-3 working days) and it has undergone an inception process from the seller’s end (1-2 working days)
sub-3.3: Payment Method Type 1 - Online Paid (Debit or Credit Card)

cookie-policy.sub-info-1: Cookies are text files containing small amounts of information that are downloaded to your computer or mobile device when you visit a site and allow a site to recognize your device. Websites use cookies to improve your browsing experience, for example, to keep you signed in, remember your site preferences, and serve you relevant content.

sub-info-2.1: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect and personalise content and ads, to provide social media features, to contact you with newsletters, marketing or promotional material and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve collected from your use of their services.
sub-info-2.2: You may opt out of receiving any, or all, of these communications from us by following the unsubscribe link or instructions provided in any email we send or by contacting us. All data stored in your browser can be cleared by clearing your browser cache. Personal data stored with {market} can be erased by contacting our support team, see below for contact details.

example-list.1: Session cookies: required to operate our service.
example-list.2: Preference cookies: used to remember your preferences and various settings.
example-list.3: Security cookies: required for security purposes.

cookie-policy.sub-info-3: You can choose to be notified when a cookie is being sent or decline them altogether in your browser. However, please note that if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our service and some features may break.
